required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Food Insecurity in Adults and Children With Cystic Fibrosis
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Food Insecurity in Adults and Children With Cystic Fibrosis
clinical_study.source: St. Luke’s Health System, Boise, Idaho

brief_summary.textblock: A survey of adults and parents of children with cystic fibrosis on food insecurity

detailed_description.textblock: A survey of adults and parents of children with cystic fibrosis to determine any correlation between food insecurity and BMI or food insecurity and FEV1, and to determine what level of food insecurity is present.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate food insecurity incidence in CF patients
primary_outcome.time_frame: one time questionnaire administered during a clinic visit
primary_outcome.description: Using a survey, determine the number of people who report food insecurity

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine if food insecurity leads to worse lung function in CF patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one time questionnaire administered during a clinic visit
secondary_outcome.description: Using a survey, report the current FEV1 and the number of people who report food insecurity to determine if there is a correlation

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine if food insecurity leads to worse BMI in CF patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one time questionnaire administered during a clinic visit.
secondary_outcome.description: using a survey, report the current BMI and the number of people who report food insecurity to see if there is a correlation

study_pop.textblock: adults and parents of children with cystic fibrosis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: have CF and are willing to complete a questionnaire during a routine clinic visit
Exclusion Criteria:

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: St. Luke’s Health System, Boise, Idaho
